description: Application for non-material amendments, comprising alterations to the north elevation fronting the car park and re-arrangement of parking and landscaping to planning permission PP/2013/1352 dated 26/07/2013 for Internal and external alterations to the Teaching Centre, Hospitality Block and Blocks A & B, demolition of Block C and erection of part two and four storey 'Heartspace' building with third floor roof terrace to link with the remaining buildings, demolition of North East building and replacement with part single two and first floor building, alterations to vehicular accesses including the provision of gates and formation of pedestrian access from The Park and alterations to vehicular access off Warwick Road, alterations to car parking areas to provide 118 spaces including 7 disabled spaces, alterations and retention of 100 cycle parking spaces and alterations to landscaping.
